activity: Group Kayaking on the Münster Canal
description: Enjoy an exciting group kayaking experience on the Münster Canal, exploring the calm waters while navigating through scenic views.

locationInfo.description: A kayaking adventure along the Münster Canal, offering stunning views of the city and the opportunity to enjoy the outdoors with friends.
safetyTips: Wear a life vest for safety.
Stay in your group and maintain a safe distance.
Be mindful of boat traffic in the canal.

description: Embark on a group hike through the peaceful trails of Werse Forest, surrounded by lush greenery and tranquil nature.

locationInfo.description: A scenic hiking trail through Werse Forest, offering an immersive experience in nature with fresh air and plenty of wildlife.
safetyTips: Carry water and snacks for the journey.
Stick to the marked trails and stay with the group.

activity: Group Volleyball at Bielefelder Str Beach
description: Gather your group for an exciting game of beach volleyball at Bielefelder Str Beach, enjoying the sun and competition.

locationInfo.description: A sandy beach area equipped with volleyball courts, perfect for a friendly yet competitive match between groups.
safetyTips: Wear appropriate footwear for the sand.
Be mindful of others using the courts.

description: Enjoy a group painting session at the Promenade, where you can capture the scenic views of Münster’s green spaces and historic architecture.

locationInfo.description: A peaceful location surrounded by parks and historic buildings, perfect for setting up easels and painting with your group.
safetyTips: Bring a portable chair or blanket for comfort.
Make sure to bring all necessary art supplies.
Respect the public space and avoid blocking paths.

activity: Group Picnic and Sports at Allwetterzoo
description: Have a fun and relaxing group picnic at Allwetterzoo, combined with some friendly sports activities at the zoo’s open grounds.

locationInfo.description: A large zoo area with ample space for a picnic and casual sports, offering a great mix of wildlife experiences and outdoor fun.
safetyTips: Keep track of your personal belongings.
Ensure food and drinks are stored safely during the picnic.
Be considerate of zoo visitors and animals.
